datasets.code:
return [{
  label: 'Projects',
  data: variables['d8ff0410-d398-4e88-8150-c371963123c0'].map(item => item.count),
  backgroundColor: [
    '#3B82F6', // Blue
    '#F59E0B', // Amber
    '#EF4444', // Red
    '#10B981', // Green
    '#8B5CF6'  // Purple
  ],
  borderWidth: 0,
  borderRadius: 6,
  maxBarThickness: 50
}]

return [{
  label: 'Quotes',
  data: Object.values(variables['d8f8caa7-fc0a-4b0a-a76e-382bd0aa59e4']),
  backgroundColor: [
    '#3B82F6', // Blue - Draft
    '#10B981', // Green - Approved
    '#F59E0B'  // Amber - Submitted
  ],
  borderColor: '#FFFFFF',
  borderWidth: 2
}]
